title: Did LTTE’s Adele Balasingham inspire Kenyan Mall killer Samantha Lewthwaite?
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – What happens when people like Adele Balasingham, Beate Arnestad and Niromi de Soyza glorify terrorism and make martyrs out of female terrorists? People like Samantha Lewthwaite emerges and killings like the Kenyan Mall slaughter resulting in over 100 innocent people being gunned down mercilessly takes place. Public killings…
